name: Finger Run - Rise up Fingers
description:
Dare to run your finger in Deadly hungry monsters who are trying to eat your finger?


Move your finger in various monsters & make as much as score you can! So, how long can you protect your finger from the hungry monsters?! Touch and hold the screen as long as you can, DO NOT touch any monsters by your finger & don't let them touch your finger too.

Features:
# Endless Gameplay
# Various monsters!
# Leaderboards
# Easy one touch gameplay
